                alt="Como baixar vídeos do YouTube sem precisar instalar programas"></figure><span class="tt-card-top-videos-item-text gui-color-primary">Como baixar vídeos do YouTube sem precisar instalar programas</span></div></a></section><footer class="gui-card-footer"><a class="gui-link-more gui-color-primary-link" href="http://www.techtudo.com.br/videos/">Veja mais vídeos</a></footer></div></div><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm2"><div id="banner_rm2" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="area-direita-b"><section class="widget-tudosobre-forum forum-categoria gui-card techtudo-card"><header class="gui-card-title gui-color-secondary-bg techtudo-card-title"><a href="http://forum.techtudo.com.br/"><h2 class="gui-text-title ajuste-fonte-tt">F&oacute;rum</h2></a></header><section class="gui-card-content"><ul class="tt-tudosobre-forum--perguntas-forum"><li class="tt-tudosobre-forum--pergunta-forum"><a class="tt-tudosobre-forum--pergunta-link"

</a></h2>

<div id=header> 
<h1>
Total Eclipse Of The Heart</h1>
<p>
<a href="/bonnie-tyler/">Bonnie Tyler</a>
</p>
<p id=extra>
Compositor: Jim Steinman</p>
</div>
<div id=boxData class=close>
<div id=artistAlbumData>
<h6 data-text='Informa&ccedil;&otilde;es do &Aacute;lbum '>Informa&ccedil;&otilde;es do &Aacute;lbum <a href="/bonnie-tyler/discografia/faster-than-the-speed-of-night.html">Faster Than the Speed of Night</a></h6>
<div class=left>
<figure class=cover>
<img width=235 height=235 data-src="https://s2.vagalume.com/bonnie-tyler/discografia/faster-than-the-speed-of-night-W235.jpg" alt="Faster Than the Speed of Night" />
</figure>
<a class=vBtn href="/bonnie-tyler/discografia/faster-than-the-speed-of-night.html#play">Ouvir &aacute;lbum completo</a>
<a class=albumTitle href="/bonnie-tyler/discografia/faster-than-the-speed-of-night.html">
Faster Than the Speed of Night</a>
Ano de lan&ccedil;amento: <b>1983</b><b>Columbia Records</b></div>
<div class=right>
<ol data-disc=1>
<li>
<a href="/bonnie-tyler/have-you-ever-seen-the-rain.html">Have You Ever Seen The Rain?</a>

<a href="/bonnie-tyler/faster-than-the-speed-of-night.html">Faster Than The Speed Of Night</a>
</li>
<li>
<a href="/bonnie-tyler/getting-so-excited.html">Getting So Excited</a>
</li>
<li class=active>
<span>Total Eclipse Of The Heart</span>
</li>
<li>
<a href="/bonnie-tyler/its-a-jungle-out-there.html">It&#039;s A Jungle Out There</a>
</li>
<li>
<a href="/bonnie-tyler/goin-through-the-motions.html">Goin&#039; Through The Motions</a>
</li>
<li>
<a href="/bonnie-tyler/tears.html">Tears</a>
</li>
<li>
<a href="/bonnie-tyler/take-me-back.html">Take Me Back</a>
</li>

<a href="/bonnie-tyler/straight-from-the-heart.html">Straight From The Heart</a>
</li>
</ol>

<div itemprop=description>
(Turn around)<br/>Every now and then, I get a little bit lonely and<br/>you're never coming round<br/>(Turn around)<br/>Every now and then, I get a little bit tired of<br/>listening to the sound of my tears<br/>(Turn around)<br/>Every now and then, I get a little bit nervous that<br/>the best of all the years have gone by<br/>(Turn around)<br/>Every now and then, I get a little bit terrified <br/>and then I see the look in your eyes<br/>(Turn around, bright eyes)<br/>Every now and then, I fall apart<br/>(Turn around, bright eyes)<br/>Every now and then, I fall apart<br/><br/><br/>And I need you now tonight, <br/>and I need you more than ever<br/>And if you only hold me tight, <br/>we'll be holding on forever<br/>And we'll only be making it right <br/>'cause we'll never be wrong together<br/>We can take it to the end of the line<br/>Your love is like a shadow on me all of the time <br/>(all of the time)<br/>I don't know what to do and I'm always in the dark<br/>We're living in a powder keg and giving off sparks<br/><br/>I really need you tonight<br/>Forever's gonna start tonight<br/>Forever's gonna start tonight<br/><br/>Once upon a time, I was falling in love<br/>But now, I'm only falling apart<br/>There's nothing I can do<br/>A total eclipse of the heart<br/>Once upon a time, there was light in my life<br/>But now, there's only love in the dark<br/>Nothing I can say<br/>A total eclipse of the heart<br/><br/>(Turn around, bright eyes)<br/>(Turn around, bright eyes)<br/><br/><br/>And I need you now tonight, <br/>and I need you more than ever<br/>And if you'll only hold me tight, <br/>we'll be holding on forever<br/>And we'll only be making it right <br/>'cause we'll never be wrong together<br/>We can take it to the end of the line<br/>Your love is like a shadow on me all of the time <br/>(all of the time)<br/>I don't know what to do and I'm always in the dark<br/>We're living in a powder keg and giving off sparks<br/><br/>I really need you tonight<br/>Forever's gonna start tonight<br/>Forever's gonna start tonight<br/><br/>Once upon a time, I was falling in love<br/>But now, I'm only falling apart<br/>Nothing I can do<br/>A total eclipse of the heart<br/>Once upon a time, there was light in my life<br/>But now, there's only love in the dark<br/>Nothing I can say<br/>A total eclipse of the heart<br/>A total eclipse of the heart<br/>A total eclipse of the heart<br/><br/>(Turn around, bright eyes)<br/>(Turn around, bright eyes)<br/>(Turn around)</div>

<div id=relTopLyrics>
<h6 data-text='Top M&uacute;sicas do Vagalume'>Top M&uacute;sicas do Vagalume</h6>
<ul>
<li class=vArtV>
<a href="/ana-vilela/trem-bala.html">
<span class=rankPos>01&deg;</span>
<img data-src="https://s2.vagalume.com/ana-vilela/images/profile-bigw120.jpg" alt="Ana Vilela" width=119 height=140 />

Trem Bala<span class=songArtistName>Ana Vilela</span>

<li class=vArtV>
<a href="/henrique-e-juliano/vidinha-de-balada.html">
<span class=rankPos>02&deg;</span>

O órgão registrou um total de 18,6 milhões de assinantes no mês passado.         <script type='text/javascript'>
          var makeShortcut = function(keyNumber, locationHref, fn) {
            var shortcuts = [
                'alt+' + keyNumber,
                'shift+alt+' + keyNumber,
                'command+' + keyNumber,
                'ctrl+' + keyNumber
            ],
            _fn = fn || function() {
                window.location = locationHref;
            };
            Mousetrap.bind(shortcuts, function() {
                _fn();
                return false;
            });
          };
          // página inicial
          makeShortcut(1, 'http://r7.com');
          // ir para conteúdo
          makeShortcut(2, '#', function() {
              scroll(0,0);
          });
          // mapa do site
          makeShortcut(3, 'http://www.r7.com/institucional/mapa-do-site/index.html');
          // foco no campo de busca
          makeShortcut(4, 'http://busca.r7.com');
          // informações de contato (página Fale com o R7)
          makeShortcut(9, 'http://noticias.r7.com/murais/fale-com-o-r7-29062016');
          // detalhes das teclas de atalho (página Acessibilidade)
          makeShortcut(0, 'http://noticias.r7.com/acessibilidade/conheca-as-ferramentas-de-acessibilidade-disponiveis-no-r7com-19082016');
        </script>
        	<script type="text/javascript" id="r7barrautil" src="http://barra.r7.com/barra.js">
		{responsivo:true, accessibility:"on", banner: "on", submenu:""}
	</script>
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/wp-content/plugins/r7-social-contraste/css/contraste_style.css" type="text/css" media="screen" /><link rel="stylesheet" href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/wp-content/plugins/r7-social-contraste/css/social_style.css" type="text/css" media="screen" /><input type="hidden" id="url_encurtada" value="http://r7.com/njvu"/><input type="hidden" id="post_title_value" value="TV paga perde quase 100 mil assinantes em fevereiro e pode perder mais sem acordo com a Simba"/>
<meta name='NextGEN' content='1.8.3' />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/wp-content/themes/default-blog/assets/css/all.min.css" type="text/css" media="screen" />

        $ = jQuery;
    </script>

            <h3 class="post-title">
                            <a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/2017/03/28/tv-paga-perde-quase-100-mil-assinantes-em-fevereiro/" title="TV paga perde quase 100 mil assinantes em fevereiro e pode perder mais sem acordo com a Simba" class="post-title-link">
                    TV paga perde quase 100 mil assinantes em fevereiro e pode perder mais sem acordo com a Simba                </a>
                    </h3>

            
    

        
    
    <div class="post-content">
        <div class='alignleft'><img width="500" height="352" src="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/files/2017/03/simba1.jpg" class="attachment-post-thumbnail wp-post-image" alt="simba1" title="simba1" /></div><p class='alignright'><input type="hidden"   data-url="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/2017/03/28/tv-paga-perde-quase-100-mil-assinantes-em-fevereiro/" data-short-url="http://r7.com/njvu" class='short_url' name='field[]' value="TV paga perde quase 100 mil assinantes em fevereiro e pode perder mais sem acordo com a Simba"/>Mais de 95,1 mil pessoas deixaram de assinar TV paga no Brasil em fevereiro de 2017, de acordo com a Agência Nacional de Telecomunicações (Anatel). O órgão registrou um total de 18,6 milhões de assinantes no mês passado. Das grandes operadoras,... <a  class="read_more" href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/2017/03/28/tv-paga-perde-quase-100-mil-assinantes-em-fevereiro/">Continue lendo</a></p>    </div>

<div id="post-22489" class="post-22489 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-novas-midias category-tv-paga">

            <div class="post-publication">
            Publicado em 24/03/2017 &agrave;s 20h54        </div>
    
            <h3 class="post-title">
                            <a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/2017/03/24/record-sbt-e-redetv-vao-sair-do-ar-na-tv-paga/" title="Record TV,  SBT e RedeTV! declaram guerra contra a TV paga" class="post-title-link">
                    Record TV,  SBT e RedeTV! declaram guerra contra a TV paga                </a>
                    </h3>

            
    

        
    
    <div class="post-content">
        <div class='alignleft'><img width="531" height="277" src="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/files/2017/03/downloadfile-16.jpg" class="attachment-post-thumbnail wp-post-image" alt="Faro, Luciana e Ratinho em campanha da SImba" title="downloadfile-16" /></div><p class='alignright'><input type="hidden"   data-url="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/2017/03/24/record-sbt-e-redetv-vao-sair-do-ar-na-tv-paga/" data-short-url="http://r7.com/rts5" class='short_url' name='field[]' value="Record TV,  SBT e RedeTV! declaram guerra contra a TV paga"/>A partir do dia 29 de março, quando o sinal analógico será desligado em São Paulo, as emissoras Record TV, SBT e Rede TV deixarão de exibir suas programações nas operadoras de TV por assinatura NET, OI, Vivo, Claro, Embratel e Sky. Sim. Os... <a  class="read_more" href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/2017/03/24/record-sbt-e-redetv-vao-sair-do-ar-na-tv-paga/">Continue lendo</a></p>    </div>

    
        <div class="post-share-bar">
        <div class="social-share"></div>    </div>
</div>
</div>

	<div class="pagination">
        <div class="wp-pagenavi">
<span class="current">1</span><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/2/" class="page" title="2">2</a><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/3/" class="page" title="3">3</a><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/4/" class="page" title="4">4</a><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/5/" class="page" title="5">5</a><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/6/" class="page" title="6">6</a><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/7/" class="page" title="7">7</a><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/8/" class="page" title="8">8</a><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/9/" class="page" title="9">9</a><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/10/" class="page" title="10">10</a><a class="next" href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/2/" >Próximo</a><span class="extend">...</span><a href="http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/page/207/" class="last" title="Último">Último</a></div>

            </div>
            <div class="l-content-widgets">
                <div id="text-2" class="widget widget_text"><h3 class="widget-title perfil">Perfil</h3>			<div class="textwidget"><div style="width: 300px;text-align: center;margin-top:5px"><img src="<br />
http://entretenimento.r7.com/blogs/keila-jimenez/files/2016/08/keila.png" /></div>
<p><H1>Keila Jimenez</H1></p>
<p>A televisão matou a janela. Concordo com Nelson Rodrigues. Mas também acredito que a televisão nos abriu portas. Portas para o entretenimento, a informação e a diversão. Há 15 anos olho por essas portas e mostro o que há dentro e fora delas. Foram dez anos no jornal O Estado de S. Paulo e quase cinco na Folha de S. Paulo escrevendo sobre TV aberta, TV paga, bastidores e as novas mídias que envolvem o mercado audiovisual. Assinei as colunas Sem Intervalo e Outro Canal. Trago essa mesma paixão e curiosidade pelo veículo para o blog KTV.</p>
<p><a href="http://r7.com/canalkeilajimenez">Acompanhe também meu canal no Youtube </a></p>
</div>
		</div><div id="r7_widget-5" class="widget widget_r7_widget"><div class="Native"></div><script>
  var gptAdSlots = [],
      unitAdPath = r7ad.hash;

  googletag = googletag || {};
  googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];

  googletag.cmd.push(function() {

    gptAdSlots[0] =
      googletag
        .defineSlot(unitAdPath, 'fluid', 'nativead-slot')
        .addService(googletag.pubads());
    googletag.pubads().setTargeting('pos', 'native');
    googletag.pubads().enableSingleRequest();
    googletag.enableServices();
  });
</script>

O órgão registrou um total de 18,6 milhões de assinantes no mês passado. 	margin-left:112px;
	display:inline-block;
}
#r7-footer-content .powered-exceda {
	float:right;
}
</style>
